name: Card World
description:
Beware

There is no saving at the moment, when you turn the game off, all progress will be lost.

The game is an early prototype intended for testing purposes to grasp the potential of its current direction.

Controls

  • WASD - to move
  • Mouse - to look
  • LMB - activate
  • RMB - let go of cubes
  • M - pause menu / world map - use it to quit the game

World map

Use the world map to travel between levels, unlock new ones and observe which level has what resources.
